data.text: @SenatorHick Pass the save act! Politicians should be required to wear body cams when talking to NGOs.

@SenatorHick Or, you can NOT be such a traitorous cunt and GET THE ILLEGAL INVADERS THE FUCK OUT OF HERE!

At least shut the fuck up and sit the fuck down and let ICE do their jobs, asshole.
@SenatorHick You want citizens to trust you. Spoil alert: Citizens don’t trust you.
@SenatorHick Wanna talk a little more about the visibility of cash doled out by Congress… “oh that’s a problem?”
@SenatorHick Yea because democrats want to destroy Americans lives all because they are protecting other Americans.

@SenatorHick They don't terrorize anyone who isn't here illegally, but then u know that and prefer to lie.  You Democrats are the only insane ones, for leaving our borders wide open for 4 damn years.   All of u should be in jail.
@remotelywrite @SenatorHick And @SenatorHick will not acknowledge your post even though it’s the top comment because it doesn’t fit his “Trump Bad” narrative.

@SenatorHick You are a fucking disgusting piece of shit! Only democrats have a problem with DHS! I live in a Red State and a Blue County, we do not have any problem with ICE. I see them setup everyday near my home.  There are no protests, no rioters, just police officers working with ICE!
